name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2

files.IW4xAll: N/A:Please select the zip archive for the All-In_one IW4x pack

content:
files:
- IW4xAll: N/A:Please select the zip archive for the All-In_one IW4x pack
game:
  exe: iw4x.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: IW4xAll
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
wine:
  d9vk: false
  esync: true
